name: Sacrifice Rising
description:
Sacrifice Rising is a 2.5d sidescroller.

Play as the Inca Priest Yutu as your temple and village are invaded by strange, undead monsters never seen by your village before. Explore your temple with your twin sister Suri and discover more about these monsters and what led to their arrival in the first place.

This narrative focused game allows you to meet mutiple characters through your journey and learn from them or pass them entirely. How will you treat old friends at the end of the world?

Who will be your final sacrifice?

How to play:

Press A and D to move along the level.
Press E to interact with objects in the game.
Press Left Click to select and skip through dialogue.
Press Spacebar to jump and skip through dialogue.
Press Right Click to hit undead enemies.
Press W to move through to new levels.
